text: @DavidLammy I look forward to forgetting the hate campaign  spewing from Remainers, opposition politicians & the UK media who were all baying for blood from a man & his wife with coronavirus who were worried about caring for their 4 year old autistic son. You are all utterly shameful & vile. https://t.co/cwysbwiz3A
